definition: state official or subject in dynastic China/I, your servant (used in addressing the sovereign)/Kangxi radical 131

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadarezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大利謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were on the servants of Hadadezer, and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大底謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌，帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: David took the gold shields carried by the officers of Hadadezer and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大利謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Also, Jeroboam son of Nebat rebelled against the king.
sentences.chinese: 所羅門的臣僕，尼八的兒子耶羅波安也舉手攻擊王。

sentences.english: And the thing was good in the eyes of Pharaoh, and in the eyes of all his servants.
sentences.chinese: 法老和他一切臣僕都以這事爲妙。

sentences.english: If a ruler hearken to lies, all his servants are wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。

sentences.english: This pleased all the people, and Saul's officers as well.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅就立他作戰士長，衆百姓和掃羅的臣僕無不喜悅。

sentences.english: And the king also and all his servants wept very bitterly.
sentences.chinese: 王和臣僕也都哭得甚慟。

sentences.english: The plan seemed good to Pharaoh and to all his officials.
sentences.chinese: 法老和他一切臣僕都以這事爲妙。

sentences.english: And all the king's servants, that were in the king's gate, bowed, and reverenced Haman: for the king had so commanded concerning him.
sentences.chinese: 在朝門的一切臣僕都跪拜哈曼，因爲王如此吩咐。

sentences.english: When King Hezekiah's officials came to Isaiah
sentences.chinese: 希西家王的臣僕就去見以賽亞。

sentences.english: If a ruler listens to lies, all his officials become wicked.
sentences.chinese: 君王若聽謊言，他一切臣僕都是奸惡。

sentences.english: Then the king's servants, which were in the king's gate, said unto Mordecai, Why transgressest thou the king's commandment?
sentences.chinese: 在朝門的臣僕問末底改說，你爲何違背王的命令呢。

sentences.english: Amon's officials conspired against him and assassinated the king in his palace.
sentences.chinese: 亞們王的臣僕背叛他，在宮裏殺了他。

sentences.english: And David took the shields of gold that were carried by the servants of Hadadezer and brought them to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他奪了哈大底謝臣僕所拿的金盾牌，帶到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: 'Are not my commanders all kings?' he says.
sentences.chinese: 他說，我的臣僕，豈不都是王麼。
